resources.string: Start activity when turning on the screen(User log in)
Connect to open networks (Requires Wifi Automágico app)
Allow SMS to be configured from server
Allow to activate the application from the server (Requires internet connection interval)
Activate tracking mode when receive SMS: Seguime
The following options will be enabled when trace mode is active
There is an error with the data entered
This will delete all data. Are you sure?
Service cannot be stopped when an alarm is activated
At this time you may need help, contact me urgently
There is a copy of the alarm on the server
The application is disabled, press the button to activate it
At this point the application is blocked
Repeat key (DO NOT USE real keys)
Requires FREE registration, visit the website
Registration is FREE, visit the website and get your key, does not require personal information
This is an incomplete version, visit website

Seguime allows you to track your device, collects GPS information and stores it for later sending to your server. From the server you can view the logs on a map and see where the device is (or was). The server can be that of a friend, family member or yours, you can mount your own server for greater privacy of your data. It also includes a timer that allows you to program when the app will activate its tracking mode and additionally send a message of help. When the app is in tracking mode it will send sms or Telegram messages with the location.

This is a project, it is not (or is not intended to be) a security application, it is for experimental use only. The developer (or developers and contributors) are not and will not be liable for the use or misuse of these programs (applications, website, source codes, etc.).

Do you like free apps?. \n You can collaborate by making donations to developers so they can continue programming your favorite apps. \n

You will see that it is not that complicated, you have the following options: 

SMS: It is a phone number that you can choose for the application to send coordinates by SMS. 
 SMS will only be sent if tracking is enabled. 
 To avoid expenses I recommend you DO NOT USE THIS OPTION if you are using the Tracking server, use this option ONLY if you are using your own server, or a secure server 
 Telegram ID: It is a Telegram identifier number, NOT THE @ID_USUARIO, to use this option visit the bot @seguimebot and say hello, it will give you your ID number, then with that number the bot will be able to send coordinates to that Telegram account. 
 
 Activity Interval: During this period the Application will be fully functioning, locating coordinates and making internet connections, a very small value may not be able to obtain coordinates if you have little GPS coverage, a very high value can consume a lot of battery In order for the application to be constantly on (and not by time intervals) set any time interval to 0 (zero) 
 Idle Interval: During this period the Application will be resting, will not make internet connections or locate coordinates, a rest serves to save battery, a very small value may consume a lot of battery, a very high value will hinder the purpose of the app In order for the application to be constantly on (and not by time intervals) set any time interval to 0 (zero) 
 Tracking: When this option is enabled the application will send messages by Telegram and SMS each time it finds a new coordinate. This option can be enabled from the website therefore for your security and to avoid expenses do not configure SMS unless you are using your own server 
 
 I hope you find this help useful :)

Timer Help: 
 It allows you to schedule a countdown, once activated it will do the following: 1. Set the phone number to send text messages. 
 2. Leave the app in activated mode, the application can only be disabled if no timers are programmed. 
 3. Send a copy of the countdown to the server. 
 
 At the end of the countdown, you will trigger an alarm that will do the following: 1. It will put the application into tracking mode. 
 2. Send a programmed SMS with the chosen text. 
 3. The server will send messages via Telegram.
Made in Argentina by Javier Martínez
Some options are not available on this version
